@WorldBoxingWall true that.

@boxing how do u see this 1 going? https://t.co/wFpHmUUwUm
@boxing every tv in America? Getting sports ads? Endorsements? Is it because baseball basketball football ect are all just more popular?
@boxing i look at a guy like ward and think, hes super skilled, has fought top opponents, well spoken, Olympic champion.. why is he not on
@boxing if an irish or british fighter had the skills of crawford or ward they would be made superstars. Why dont USA fans do the same?
@andreward well done for doing what other fighters won't do, step up to the plate and fight the best. Great fight and a well earned win #SOG
@thefightscore thought ward won by 1 or 2 pts. Couldnt have gone either way. But it was no robbery as many in the media r suggesting
@thefightscore the sport over tjose whos only involvemnt in the sport is from a laptop. In #KovalevWard i seen a great close fight. That I
@thefightscore its all a matter of opinion. I trust the opinion of the trained eye in fighters coaches judges... those who live and breath
@thefightscore most of them have no boxing experience at all to call upon and just score aggression. Not ring gen, defence or effectiveness
@thefightscore people score aggression like its the only thing they know. Then when their card is so far off, its a robbery. I believe
@thefightscore i hear ya. My point is that most fighters/coaches have said this was a close fight. A 1 point fight either way. These media
@thefightscore @danrafaelespn how many of those press or media people have been in a ring or even a gym?
@mattmacklin @mickconlan11 the kids got talent. In a great gym to with manny, jessie and oscar. Good job calling #KovalevWard matt 👍
Just watched #KovalevWard for the 3rd time.Can we get a date on the rematch yet? Well done @andreward on a well deserved victory. #P4P #SOG
@Laceupboxing adjustments! 👍thats what edged it for me.
@PaulMalignaggi is the best voice in boxing. Its that simple
And the new. Had andre winning on my card. Delighted for @andreward #P4P #SOG #KovalevWard
@BoxingKingdom14 this is a 32yr old Andre ward not a 49yr old bhop.Ward is having his 4th fight in 16months & in the shape if his life #SOG
@andreward has the skills to beat this man. He looks and sounds like he won't be denied. Ward on points. #KovalevWard #P4P #SOG
@SkySportsBoxing im going to stream it from the USA. Without @SkyGlennMcCrory or @PaulMalignaggi its hard to listen to sky's pundits.
@mattmacklin @mickconlan11 @jay_quigley those two have made a great choice in coach in manny. Best of luck lads. Future world champs #boxing
@FullTiltPoker last night... all in with set of 10's on K T 5 (rainbow board)... he called... jack on the turn... bust
